name: Steak, Steak, Steak
description:
Astronaut? Cooking steaks? Would you like some alien customers? Please help our astronaut man to earn the money for his spaceship!

‘Steak, Steak, Steak’ is a simple game you will like to control and score. Whenever you cook, our alien customers will love to pay and enjoy their meal! Give the well-cooked steak, earn the money, and try to hit today’s goal for the next level. Who knows? Maybe, in the end, you could be the person with the highest score in this game.

  • Nice Pixely game astetic
  • 4 levels
  • Different endings
  • Tasty cooked steak
